item.description:
This will be the LONG BEACH HIKE. (sorry about that)  It's about a 7 mile loop. In case you don't want to do the entire distance please bring a friend so you can turn around whenever you like.  Yes the first part will be on the road unless its a very low tide. It can be rocky but manageable.

Please bring a flashlight for your safety.

This was a great time. I hope many of you can join us.

Please dress I layers for the weather.

 

 

The Apres-hike festivities will be TBD. The New World Tavern is always on my list.

 

FYI - the moonrise calender

http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/astronomy.html?n=2406&month=4&year=2013&obj=moon&afl=-11&day=1
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the bath house. Half way down the public beach.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Full Moon Hike on Long Beach Plymouth
